src:
Coco pinatutunayan ang kakayahan kahit hindi nag-aral
07 Nov 2019, 11:23 by Aster Amoyo
BALIK si Coco Martin sa pagiging lead actor-director at producer ng bago  niyang Metro Manila Film Festival I(MMFF) entry, ang action-comedy na “3pol Trobol: Huli Ka Balbon” under his own CCM Productions.
Unang sumabak si Coco sa pagdidirek ng pelikula in 2017 sa pamamagitan ng kanyang sariling version ng “Ang Panday” na unang pinagbidahan ng namayapang Movie King na si Fernando Poe, Jr.  Si Coco rin ang nagbida at nag-produce ng nasabing pelikula.
Wala mang formal background si Coco sa pagdidirek, natutunan niya ito sa  kanyang long-running action-drama TV series na “FPJ’s Ang Probinsyano” where he serves as one of the directors.
Although irreplaceable ang yumaong si FPJ, marami ang nagsasabi na si Coco umano ang pinakabagong version ng kanyang idolong si FPJ.
text:
Coco proves the ability even if not educated
07 Nov 2019, 11:23 by Aster Amoyo
Coco Martin returns for the lead actor-director and producer of her new Metro Manila Film Festival I (MMFF) entry, the action-comedy "3pol Trobol: Huli Ka Balbon" under her own CCM Productions.
Coco first made her film debut in 2017 with her own version of "The Panday" which was first voiced by Movie King Fernando Poe, Jr. Coco also directed and produced the film.
Coco has no formal background in directing, he learned this from his long-running action-drama TV series "FPJ's The Provinces" where he serves as one of the directors.
Although the deceased FPJ is irreplaceable, many say that Coco is said to be the latest version of his idol FPJ.
